title: Carnival of Rust
description: Pain, sorrow, anger, passion are emotions that moved writer to start writing this book. Sometimes, when we are cornered and don't know what to do we have those emotions and want to burn the whole world. A moment later like rain is falling all over us and we feel like unprotected robots exposed to ones nemesis creating of us "Carnival of rust".
author: Marat M'saev Daan
